name: Saber Chronicles
description:
Highscore based game.

Controls - 

WASD  to move 

Left Click to draw your saber and slice the enemies.

Right Click to slow enemies down immensely.

Spacebar to dodge.

Show the order you can survive the invasion, longer than they think!

Feedback is appreciated, Not playtested it much so expect a few bugs or a lot of them!

Assets from Unity asset store, freesound.org, humble bundle.
